thread.title: 16 Valentine's Day Jewelry Ideas For Girlfriends Who Hate Corny Stuff

author: Kelsey Borresen
title: 16 Valentine's Day Jewelry Ideas For Girlfriends Who Hate Corny Stuff
text:
16 Valentine's Day Jewelry Ideas For Girlfriends Who Hate Corny Stuff Not your average heart necklace. üòú üíù 02/08/2017 07:18 pm ET Kelsey Borresen Relationships Editor, The Huffington Post 
Attention significant others of the world: Not every girl wants (or expects) you to shell out the big bucks for some corny diamond-encrusted, heart-shaped jewelry. 
In fact, we know quite a few girlfriends who would much prefer something a little less cookie-cutter . Below, 16 unconventional Valentine‚Äôs Day jewelry ideas for the sassy lady in your life: 1 "Queen Of Queso" bracelet Buy it here for $28.00. 2 "Naps" earrings Buy them here for $14.99. 3 "Wanna Spoon?" necklace Buy it here for $19.98. 4 "Boss Lady" earrings Buy them here for $32.00. 5 "Booty" ring Buy it here for $35.26. 6 "Book babe" brooch Buy it here for $9.00. 7 "Cheetos" necklace Buy it here for $44.00. 8 "Don't Be A Prick" bracelet Buy it here for $14.99. 9 "All I Care About Is Wine" bracelet Buy it here for $27.00. 10 "Best Bae" earrings Buy them here for $32.00. 11 "I Truly Donut Care" necklace Buy it here for $25.00. 12 "Gangster Of Love" bracelet Buy it here for $28.00. 13 "Braless & Flawless" necklace Buy it here for $24.00. 14 "Party of 2" necklace Buy it here for $68.00. 15 "Weirdo" brooch Buy it here for $9.00. 16 "Salty" necklace Buy it here for $80.00.
